subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Athletics became the first team in nine years to sweep a four-game series against the Yankees when Coco Crisp hit a game-winning single with one out in the bottom of the 12th.
snippet: The Athletics became the first team in nine years to sweep a four-game series against the Yankees when Coco Crisp hit a game-winning single with one out in the bottom of the 12th.
